Description_lang: Your spells and abilities have the chance to grant your sigil a Thrum of Vivacity, aiding you however it sees fit.If Damage proc If in combat with multiple targets, explode for X Fire damage after 10s. If above 90% Health, gain X Highest secondary for 15s If below 30% Health, heals for X.  If target is below 20% and can execute, execute.  Nothing is true, gain Y lowest secondary If Healing proc If target below 50% Health, heal them for X.  If target above 90% Health, you gain X Highest secondary for 15s.  If your mana is below 50%, gain X mana.  Nothing is true, gain Y lowest secondary.
